message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $18,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $13,500 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to go down to $14,500.  This is a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
